title: My Pixel 2 XL is now lagging after Android 10 update. It also gets VERY HOT when in use now.
content: My Pixel 2 XL is now lagging after Android 10 update.  It also gets VERY HOT when in use now.  I've had this phone for almost two years and it's always been extremely fast and never got hot.  Now it's no better than a cheap Android phone!  Is it possible to go back to Android 9.x ???
